Introduction
Bernard Picton currently works at the National Museum of Northern Ireland and is a Research Fellow at School of Biological Sciences, Queen's University Belfast. Bernard does research in Marine Biology, Linnaean Taxonomy and Evolutionary Biology. His current projects are 'Sponge Biodiversity of Rathlin Island' and 'Nudibranchs of the NE Atlantic Ocean'.
